name: FinnSyll
body:
# [ยง](https://github.com/tsnaomi/finnsyll/generated_pages/new) [FINNSYLL](https://finnsyll.herokuapp.com/)
----

## primary goals
- identify unmarked compound boundaries using machine learning
- explore vowel (T4) variation using Prosodic

## secondary goals
- explore variation in Finnish consonant clusters

## todo list
#### syllabifier
* complicate T4 to be insensitive to codas
* use front/back vowel harmony to detect compound boundaries
* pull in the parts of Prosodic that are relevant to FinnSyll

#### webdev
* implement stopword functionality?
* explore other evaluation methods
* when we are satisfied with the syllabifier's performance, syllabify all unseen lemmas
* when creating the data frame, do not create rows for Tokens where Token.freq == 0

## questions for Arto
* **What subset of Project Gutenberg do we want to pull into the syllabifier? Only the Finnish poetry already stored in Prosodic?**

## open questions
* **Is /au/ always ambiguous in unstressed syllables? E.g., "rakkauden".**

## q & a
* **Does the syllabifier always join long vowels?** Yes, this is built into T6.

## notes
#### Ideally, bad simplex tokens will only include stopwords
#### Split unstressed heavy syllables 
*This rule is because of stress*. Since we can split these syllables, we do not see the repair in which the stress shifts to an even syllable. (Consider this repair during stress assignment later.) By implementing this at the syllabifier layer, we will not have to repair syllabifications at the stress assignment layer.

     tie
     da.ni.el, *da.niel

     vei
     es.se.is.ti, *es.seis.ti

     tiu
     e.van.ke.li.u.me.ja, *e.van.ke.liu.me.ja

     no.vel.lien, \*no.vel.li.en < *the last syllable is extrametrical*

Extrametricality does not apply to the various morphemes in a compound -- it only applies to the compound as a whole. Perhaps, all of the stress rules apply in this way.

**NB**: Here, splitting is occurring where it shouldn't:

    sosiaaliterapeutti    T1 T4 T6 T7    so.si.aa..li.te.ra.pe.ut.ti    so.si.aa.li.te.ra.peut.ti
